content.question: Which of the following claims does Johnson make about the institution of slavery?

choices.label: It drove up the cost of goods enslaved people needed in order to survive.
It provided wealth for enslavers and access to basic provisions for enslaved people.
It treated enslaved people inhumanely and prevented enslaved people from meeting their basic needs.
It spread rapidly throughout the Northern and Southern states in the mid-nineteenth century.

content.answer: It treated enslaved people inhumanely and prevented enslaved people from meeting their basic needs.

topic.text: 2.3: Capture and the Impact of the Slave Trade on West African Societies
